Class PhysicalMin

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Op

                      niagara.physical.PhysicalMin
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Initializable, Instrumentable, Schedulable, SchemaProducer, SerializableToXML
public class PhysicalMin
extends PhysicalAggregate

This is the PhysicalSumOperator that extends the PhysicalGroupOperator with the implementation of Sum (a form of grouping)

Version:
1.0
